Revert. You didn't "fix" anything. There's nothing wrong with redirects. Now knock it off. This IS merely your [[POV]] rather than an attempt at improving the article.
Revert edit by GIPU "[[Special:Contributions/65.25.126.204|65.25.126.204]]". No need to avoid a redirect, and pointless edits are bad example to others. Plus, this sort of editting is not [[NPOV]].
